vote.title: A public hearing, pursuant to Chapter 26 of the Texas Parks and Wildlife Code, to receive comments on the proposed use of Bachman Lake Park located at 3500 West Northwest Highway, totaling approximately 11,059 square feet of land, for the Federal Aviation Administration Fiber Optic Communications Project for the purpose of upgrading air traffic control communications for Dallas Love Field Airport, and, at the close of the public hearing, consideration of a resolution authorizing the proposed use of parkland pursuant to Chapter 26 of the Texas Parks and Wildlife Code - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
